title: Compton - compare electron and proton systems

content.question:

In system <math alttext="E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>E</mtext></math>, the particle is a free electron, while in system <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>P</mtext></math> the particle is a free proton.
